model

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object
    This class contains all the configuration parameters for the game.
    Author:
    Team B

    • Constructor Detail

      • Config

        public Config(int noOfPlayers)
        Constructor specifying the number of players. The no of players determines the no of rank 1 castles in the game.
        Parameters:
        noOfPlayers - The no of players in the game.

      • Config

        public Config()
        Default constructor. No of players by default would be 4.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateNoOfRank1Castles

        private int calculateNoOfRank1Castles(int noOfPlayers)
        This method calculates the no of rank 1 castles based on the no of players. This calculation is done by the rules of of the game.
        Parameters:
        noOfPlayers - The no of players in the game.
        Returns:
        Returns the no of rank 1 castles computed.
